info.description:
**Build a powerful video experience from on-demand streaming to dynamic social feeds with a single API.**

RIXL handles video processing, ingestion and global delivery so you don't have to.
With builtin support for transcoding, storage and structured media feeds, Our API makes it easy to deliver high-quality media content at scale.
info.title: RIXL API

get.description: Retrieve posts in a feed, with pagination.

parameters.description:
Maximum number of items to return in a single request.
**Default:** `25`
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description:
Starting point of the result set.
To get page 2 with a limit of 25, set `offset` to `25`.
**Default:** `0`
parameters.name: offset

400.description: Invalid feed ID or query parameters

get.description: Retrieve posts in a feed by a specific creator, with pagination.

parameters.description:
Maximum number of items to return in a single request.
**Default:** `25`
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description:
Starting point of the result set.
To get page 2 with a limit of 25, set `offset` to `25`.
**Default:** `0`
parameters.name: offset

400.description: Invalid feed ID, creator ID, or query parameters

get.description: Retrieve a post from feed by its ID
Retrieve all images for a specific project, with pagination and sorting.

parameters.description:
Maximum number of items to return in a single request.
**Default:** `25`
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description:
Starting point of the result set.
To get page 2 with a limit of 25, set `offset` to `25`.
**Default:** `0`
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: Field to sort by (created_at, name, size, updated_at)
parameters.name: sort

post.description: Complete the upload process and create the image record using API key authentication

500.description: Failed to complete upload or create image

post.description: Initialize a presigned URL upload for an image file using API key authentication

get.description: Retrieve an image by its ID for a specific project.

delete.description: delete an image by marking it as deleted

400.description: Invalid project ID or image ID

get.description: Retrieve all videos for a specific project, with pagination and sorting.

parameters.description:
Maximum number of items to return in a single request.
**Default:** `25`
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description:
Starting point of the result set.
To get page 2 with a limit of 25, set `offset` to `25`.
**Default:** `0`
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: Field to sort by (created_at, name, size, updated_at, duration)
parameters.name: sort

get.description: Get list of supported languages for subtitles

post.description: Mark a video upload as complete after successful upload to storage using API key authentication
Initialize a video upload and get presigned URLs for video and poster using API key authentication

get.description: Retrieve a video by its ID for a specific project.

post.description: Replace all audio tracks with the provided ones using API key authentication

delete.description: Remove all additional audio tracks from a video using API key authentication

put.description: Add or replace an audio track for a specific language using API key authentication

delete.description: Remove an audio track for a specific language using API key authentication
Remove an additional audio track from a video using API key authentication

put.description: Replace all chapters for a video (atomic PUT operation) using API key authentication

400.description: Invalid request body or video duration not available

delete.description: Remove all chapters from a video using API key authentication
Delete a video by its ID within a project

400.description: Invalid project ID or video ID

post.description: Replace all subtitles with the provided ones using API key authentication

delete.description: Remove all subtitles from a video using API key authentication

put.description: Add or replace a subtitle for a specific language using API key authentication

delete.description: Remove a subtitle for a specific language using API key authentication
Remove a subtitle from a video using API key authentication

put.description: Update the thumbnail image for an existing video

github_com_qeeqez_api_internal_errors.Er.description: Standard error response returned by the API

details.example: The provided ID is not valid

error.description: Error message describing what went wrong

data.description: Data contains the slice of items for the current request.
Data contains the slice of items for the current request.
Data contains the slice of items for the current request.

limit.description: Maximum number of items to return in a single request.

offset.description: Starting point of the result set.

total.description: The total number of available items in the full list.

ApiKeyAuth.description: Internal API key for service-to-service communication.
ApiKeyAuth.name: X-API-Key

Bearer.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
Bearer.name: Authorization

tags.description:
**Build dynamic social experiences.**

Feeds are ordered collections of Posts, designed for creating vertical video carousels, stories, or social timelines. Each Post contains your media (video or image) and its associated metadata.
tags.name: Feeds

tags.description:
**Upload once, stream perfectly anywhere.**

RIXL's intelligent processing pipeline analyzes your video and transcodes it for optimal quality and performance. We handle the complexity so you can deliver a perfect playback experience every time.
tags.name: Videos

tags.description:
**Deliver fast, perfectly formatted images.**

RIXL automatically handles image optimization, format conversion, and ThumbHash generation. All images are served via our global CDN for an ideal user experience.
tags.name: Images
